meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Olsen Robin Klenke Patrick Kerr Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4094.

td.p: Scott Olsen, a college student from San Diego, California
Robin Klenke, an internal auditor from San Martin, California
Patrick Kerr, a freelance writer originally from Fort Scott, Kansas

tr.td: JAMES BUCHANAN
INTERNATIONAL AIRLINES
(Alex: We want you to give us the country that is each airline's home base.)
TORRID STORY PROBLEMS
POKER NIGHT
SPORTS CHANNEL
WITH A CAPITAL Q

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Buchanan may have sat by his fire & thought of this type of house where he, like his successor, was born')

tr.td: Buchanan may have sat by his fire & thought of this type of house where he, like his successor, was born

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Patrick: [Fist pump upon finding out he was correct] Yes!)
(Alex: How much money--hello! $14,000 for a $31,400 total!)
[Boisterous audience reaction]
(Alex: Well done. We\'ll see you tomorrow to wrap up the week here on Jeopardy!)
(Patrick: [Doing a fist bang and clapping] Woo!)
(Alex: Is he happy or what? "Yes" is the answer. So long.)
ScottWhat are Egypt & Saudi Arab.
$1,800
RobinWhat are Saudi Arabia and
$5,500
PatrickWhat is Egypt and Jordan
$14,000
Egypt & Jordan')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'They are the 2 Arab countries in which Israel currently has embassies')

tr.td: ISRAEL
They are the 2 Arab countries in which Israel currently has embassies
Patrick
Robin
Scott
New champion: $31,400
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Patrick
Robin
Scott

21 R
(including 3 DDs),
8 W

7 R,
3 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
